testcase.name: When result is <elem>text</elem> expecting <elem>...</elem> should be Success
When result is <elem>text</elem> expecting ... should be Success
When result is <elem /> expecting <elem>...</elem> should be Success
When result is <elem /> expecting <elem attrib="..." /> should be Failure
When result is <elem>...</elem> expecting <elem>...</elem> should be Success
When result is <elem>...</elem> expecting ... should be Success
When result is <elem>...</elem> expecting <elem>text</elem> should be Failure
When result is <elem attrib="val" /> expecting <elem attrib="..." /> should be Success
When result is <elem attrib="val" /> expecting ... should be Success
When result is <elem attrib="val" /> expecting <elem>...</elem> should be Failure
When result is <outer>text<inner1 /><inner2 /></outer> expecting <outer>...</outer> should be Success
When result is <outer>text<inner1 /><inner2 /></outer> expecting <outer>...<inner1 />...</outer> should be Success
When result is <outer>text<inner1 /><inner2 /></outer> expecting ... should be Success
When result is <outer><inner /></outer> expecting <outer>...</outer> should be Success
When result is <outer><inner /></outer> expecting <outer>...<inner /></outer> should be Failure
When result is usual text node expecting ... should be Success
When result is usual text node expecting '...' should be Failure
When result is whitespace-only text node expecting ... should be Success
When result is whitespace-only text node expecting usual text node should be Failure
When result is zero-length text node expecting ... should be Success
When result is zero-length text node expecting usual text node should be Failure
When result is three-dot text node expecting ... should be Success
When result is three-dot text node expecting usual text node should be Failure
When result is three-dot text node expecting '...' should be Failure
When result is <!--comment--> expecting <!--...--> should be Success
When result is <!--comment--> expecting ... should be Success
When result is <!----> expecting <!--...--> should be Success
When result is <!--...--> expecting <!--...--> should be Success
When result is <!--...--> expecting ... should be Success
When result is <!--...--> expecting <!--comment--> should be Failure
When result is <?pi data?> expecting <?pi ...?> should be Success
When result is <?pi data?> expecting ... should be Success
When result is <?pi?> expecting <?pi ...?> should be Success
When result is <?pi ...?> expecting <?pi ...?> should be Success
When result is <?pi ...?> expecting ... should be Success
When result is <?pi ...?> expecting <?pi data?> should be Failure
When result is <xsl:document><?pi?><!--comment--><elem /></xsl:document> expecting <xsl:document>...</xsl:document> should be Success
When result is <xsl:document><?pi?><!--comment--><elem /></xsl:document> expecting ... should be Success
When result is <xsl:document /> expecting ... should be Success
When result is <xsl:document /> expecting <xsl:document>...</xsl:document> should be Failure

When result is <xsl:document>...</xsl:document> expecting <xsl:document>text</xsl:document> should be Failure

When result is xmlns:prefix="..." expecting ... should be Success
When result is xmlns:prefix="..." expecting xmlns:prefix="namespace-uri" should be Failure

testsuite.name: For resultant sequence of multiple nodes

testcase.name: When result is sequence of <elem1 /><elem2 /> expecting ...<elem2 /> should be Success
When result is sequence of <elem1 /><elem2 /> expecting sequence of two ... should be Success
When result is sequence of <elem1 /><elem2 /> expecting ... should be Failure
When result is sequence of <elem1 /><elem2 /> expecting ...... should be Failure
When result is sequence of <elem1 /><elem2 /> expecting sequence of three ... should be Failure
expecting ... should be Failure
When result is 'string' expecting 'string' should be Success
When result is 'string' expecting ... should be Failure
When result is 'string' expecting '...' should be Failure
When result is '...' expecting '...' should be Success
When result is '...' expecting ... should be Failure
When result is '...' expecting 'string' should be Failure
expecting .... (four dots) should be Failure
expecting ...x (three dots with extra character) should be Failure
expecting ... with surrounding whitespace should be Failure
expecting '...' (xs:string) should be Failure
